title: failed purchased
body: i spend 585 RP to purchase malphite Champion, the amount has been deducted but the champion it doesn't unlocked, so i purchased by IP, please advice

replies.body: It looks like you used the RP to gift Malphite to a friend.  You then used IP to unlock Malphite for yourself.  If this wasn't intended, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can look into this individually with you.  In general we don't refund gifts, but we'll see if there's anything we could do.  We'll reply back asap!
